Public Class XpsResource Inherits XpsPartBase Implements IDisposable

Docs.summary: 定義資源的基底類別，這些資源可以加入至 。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列範例示範如何將加入<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource>衍生類型至<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Commit() cil managed

Docs.summary: 認可所有變更，並將資源排清到文件套件。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 根據設定的<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>和<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>和<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>，排清作業的<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A>方法可能會延遲到整個<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>已關閉。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A>方法 （在衍生類別中） 當您將資源新增到<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]

Docs.returns: 用於讀取或寫入資源的 。

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: 此成員支援 Windows Presentation Foundation 基礎結構，但並不適合直接透過您的程式碼使用。
